subject: Commercial use of Junit - license issues
msgSnippet: I am interested in using Junit internally (not for distribution) at my company for some product testing. However, our open source office is very concerned
messageBody:
I am interested in using Junit internally (not for distribution) at my
company for some product testing. However, our open source office is
very concerned about the IBM Common Public License and its
applicability to users and distributors of Junit and possible patent
infringements.

Can anyone comment on this concern ? If Kent or Erich are listening,
can Junit by licensed under an alternate open-source or
commercial license ?



Chris Chaulk
